dialogue: I've been hired by an employee who just resigned.
I'll be his stand-in for the exit interview.
I'd like to begin by discussing your senseless slaughter of the English language.
...And on April 8th, you were heard saying, "We have to nip that problem in the butt."
Now let's talk about your stellar leadership.
"If I want you to do something that's a waste of time, it's my prerogative!"
I'm probably one of those misunderstood geniuses.
